actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to allow the military departments to accept voluntary, uncompensated services from persons desiring to provide such services for military department museums.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the military department concerned to accept volunteer services for any military museum. States that such volunteers shall not be considered U. S. employees except in specified circumstances.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to allow the military departments to accept voluntary, uncompensated services from persons desiring to provide such services for military department museums.
